nodes.text: ILMxLAB is Lucasfilm Ltd.'s immersive entertainment studio. Founded in 2015, the studio creates virtual and mixed reality experiences that invite fans to step inside the worlds of their favorite stories. ILMxLAB has created VR projects like Star Wars: Secrets of the Empire, Star Wars: Trials on Tatooine, the episodic VR experience Vader Immortal: A Star Wars VR Series, the mixed reality experiment Project Porg and Star Wars: Tales from the Galaxy's Edge.
